products.title: Brushed Sand Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Brushed Sand Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Beige Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Beige Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Infusion asc Beige Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4104. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Mono Biscuit Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Mono Biscuit Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Luna Blackout Parchment Cream Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Luna Blackout Parchment Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Luna Blackout Parchment Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
